mapper.select: select o.* from trainOperationRoute o, (select a.trainInfo_no from (select trainInfo_no from trainOperationRoute o, trainStation s where o.trainStation_no = #{startStationNo} and o.trainStation_no = s.no order by trainStation_no) a, (select trainInfo_no from trainOperationRoute, trainStation where trainOperationRoute.trainStation_no = #{endStationNo} and trainOperationRoute.trainStation_no = trainStation.no order by trainStation_no) b where a.trainInfo_no = b.trainInfo_no) sub_query where o.trainInfo_no = sub_query.trainInfo_no and (o.trainStation_no = #{startStationNo} or o.trainStation_no = #{endStationNo}) and o.trainCategory_no = #{categoryNo};
select name from trainStation where no = #{trainStation_no}
